Package io.github.zero88.jooqx

Interface SQLQueryExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JooqDSLProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Jooqx, JooqxBase<S>, JooqxConn, JooqxTx, LegacyInternal<S>, LegacyJooqx, LegacyJooqxTx, SQLExecutor<S,​B,​PQ,​RS,​RC>
    public interface SQLQueryExecutor
extends JooqDSLProvider
    Represents for a query executor that executes SQL command
    Since:
    2.0.0
